headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: ranking_type
parameters.description: The type of ranking. Enum values: BRANDED_CONTENT : ranking by branded content. ORGANIC_CONTENT : ranking by organic content.

parameters.name: time_period
parameters.description: The time period for the ranking. Enum values: WEEK : one week. MONTH : one month.

parameters.name: time_period_lookback
parameters.description: The specific lookback period for the ranking. Enum values: ONE : the most recent available period. TWO : the second most recent period. THREE : the third most recent period. For example, if the most recent available monthly period is October and you set time_period to MONTH and time_period_lookback to TWO , the system will return ranking data for September.

parameters.name: label_id
parameters.description: Creator label ID. When ranking_type is BRANDED_CONTENT , specify creator industry labels via this field. To obtain creator industry labels, use /tto/tcm/category/label/ . The creator industry labels will be available from the returned industry_labels . When ranking_type is ORGANIC_CONTENT , specify content tag labels via this field. To obtain content tag labels, use /tto/tcm/category/label/ . The content tag labels will be available from the returned content_labels .

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: The code of the country or region that the creator ranking is for. Currently, the only supported enum value is US because the creator ranking data is only available for the United States.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Value range: ≥ 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-100. Default value: 20.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: creators
fields.description: The list of up to the top 100 creators, sorted by rank. Note : The actual number of returned creators may be less than 100, depending on the available data at the time of the query.

fields.name: ranking_change
fields.description: The change in rank position for the creator compared to the rank in the last time period. A positive rank_change indicates an increase in rank. For example, if the rank position shifts from 5 to 1, rank_change will be +4 . A negative rank_change indicates a decrease in rank. For example, if the rank position shifts from 1 to 5, rank_change will be -4 . A rank_change of 0 indicates no changes in rank. A rank_change marked as N/A indicates that the creator was not present in the top ranking list in the last time period.

fields.name: profile_image
fields.description: The temporary URL for the profile image of the creator, which needs to be re-acquired after expiration. The expiration time is included in the URL after the x-expires parameter, in the format of an Epoch/Unix timestamp in seconds. Example: https://p16-sign.tiktokcdn-us.com/obj/tos-useast5-avt-0123-tx/ab123456789d1234567ab54de76f0d3b?lk3s=429d27ce&nonce=42773&refresh_token=123a4ab1234567a1aa1a11a1aa11aa1a&x-expires=1732046400&x-signature=aa1Q11aa1Da1a1aVZO%1Fa1oADaL1%1D&shp=111d11ce&shcp=- .

fields.name: country
fields.description: The code of the country or region where the creator is located. Currently, the only supported enum value is US because the creator ranking data is only available for the United States.

fields.name: handle
fields.description: The handle name of the creator.

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The display name of the creator.

fields.name: industry_labels
fields.description: The list of industry labels associated with the creator. Creator industry labels are assigned to creators based on the commercial content they produce, including ad creatives and branded content on their TikTok accounts, and represent their commercial experience in certain industries. Note : Creators who no longer have the queried label may still be returned in the results. This is because the label was associated with them at the time the rank was generated. However, these labels can change over time, so a creator might lose a label after the rank has been generated.

fields.name: label_id
fields.description: The ID of the creator industry label.

fields.name: label_name
fields.description: The name of the creator industry label.

fields.name: content_labels
fields.description: The list of content tag labels associated with the creator. Content tag labels are assigned to creators based on the main focus of the creator’s TikTok account, and represent the direction of the creator’s organic content. Note : Creators who no longer have the queried label may still be returned in the results. This is because the label was associated with them at the time the rank was generated. However, these labels can change over time, so a creator might lose a label after the rank has been generated.

fields.name: label_name
fields.description: The ID of the content tag label.

fields.name: label_id
fields.description: The name of the content tag label.

fields.name: score
fields.description: When ranking_type is BRANDED_CONTENT , this field represents commercial score, which is calculated based on the creator’s experience with commercial content with and the performance of their past commercial content. When ranking_type is ORGANIC_CONTENT , this field represents follower growth score (an indicator of how quickly the creator’s follower count is growing), which is calculated based on the creator’s follower count growth and video performance within the specified time period. Example: 81.56906666666666.

fields.name: number_of_followers
fields.description: Follower count. The creator’s current follower count. Example: 242703.

fields.name: branded_content_video_views
fields.description: Branded content video views. The total views of all branded content videos, where the video’s branded content toggle was enabled, produced by the Creator within the specified time period. Example: 528377. Note : This field returns a non-null value only when ranking_type is BRANDED_CONTENT in the request.

fields.name: branded_content_engagement_rate
fields.description: Branded content engagement rate. The engagement rate of branded content within the specified time period, calculated as (total number of comments, likes, and shares of branded content) / (total video views). For example, a value of 3.02 means the branded content engagement rate is 3.02%. Note : This field returns a non-null value only when ranking_type is BRANDED_CONTENT in the request.

fields.name: total_video_views
fields.description: Total video views. The total number of views from all of the creator’s videos within the specified time period. Example: 633516.

fields.name: engagement_rate
fields.description: Engagement rate. The collective engagement rate for all of the creator’s videos during the specified time period. This is calculated as (total number of comments, likes and shares)/(total video views). For example, a value of 2.97 means the branded content engagement rate is 2.97%.

fields.name: starting_price
fields.description: The creator’s starting base price. Example: 30000. Note : If the creator’s starting base pay is not set, the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: starting_price_currency
fields.description: The currency for the creator’s starting base price. Example: USD . Note : If the creator’s starting base pay is not set, the value of this field will be an empty string ( "" ).

fields.name: follower_growth
fields.description: The number of followers gained during the specified time period. Example: 180476. Note : This field returns a non-null value only when ranking_type is ORGANIC_CONTENT in the request.

fields.name: last_updated_at
fields.description: The UTC+0 time when the ranking data was last updated, in ISO-8601 format. Example: 2024-11-19T14:14:22Z .

fields.name: page_info
fields.description: Pagination information.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Current page number.

fields.name: page_size
fields.description: Page size.

fields.name: total_number
fields.description: Total number of results.

fields.name: total_page
fields.description: Total pages of results.

example.body:
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "OK",
    "request_id": "{{request_id}}",
    "data": {
        "creators": [
            {
                "branded_content_engagement_rate": null,
                "branded_content_video_views": null,
                "content_labels": [
                    {
                        "label_id": "11014001",
                        "label_name": "Automobiles"
                    }
                ],
                "country": "US",
                "display_name": "{{display_name}}",
                "engagement_rate": 1.95,
                "follower_growth": 180476,
                "handle": "{{handle}}",
                "industry_labels": [
                    {
                        "label_id": "14100000000",
                        "label_name": "Oral Care"
                    }
                ],
                "number_of_followers": 10711990,
                "profile_image": "{{profile_image}}",
                "ranking_change": "+1",
                "score": 91.476275,
                "starting_price": 30000,
                "starting_price_currency": "USD",
                "total_video_views": 329546252
            },
            ...,
            {
                "branded_content_engagement_rate": null,
                "branded_content_video_views": null,
                "content_labels": [
                    {
                        "label_id": "11014001",
                        "label_name": "Automobiles"
                    }
                ],
                "country": "US",
                "display_name": "{{display_name}}",
                "engagement_rate": 1.94,
                "follower_growth": 6083,
                "handle": "{{handle}}",
                "industry_labels": null,
                "number_of_followers": 132742,
                "profile_image": "{{profile_image}}",
                "ranking_change": "N/A",
                "score": 82.74355,
                "starting_price": null,
                "starting_price_currency": "",
                "total_video_views": 3213298
            }
        ],
        "last_updated_at": "2024-11-19T14:14:22Z",
        "page_info": {
            "page": 1,
            "page_size": 20,
            "total_number": 100,
            "total_page": 5
        }
    }
}
